short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The toolbar popup allows you to search and highlight keywords on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension, which is known as "Keyword Search," allows you to find and highlight the keywords you're looking for in any website.

Then go to a web page and open the toolbar popup UI, then enter your keyword in the designated space. Then click on the "Find" button or hit "Enter" on your keyboard to perform the search. All of the relevant terms within the web page will be highlighted in yellow.

The highlighted words will be erased if you click on the Clear button. There are various options on the options page to change highlight features.
